validation.min: :_label must be a minimum of :_rule_value characters.
validation.max: :_label must be a maximum of :_rule_value characters.
validation.email: :_label is not a valid email address
validation.max_width: :_label width has to be less than :_rule_value px
validation.min_width: :_label width has to be more than :_rule_value px
validation.max_height: :_label height has to be less than :_rule_value px
validation.min_height: :_label height has to be more than :_rule_value px
validation.max_ratio: :_label ratio has to be less than :_rule_value
validation.min_ratio: :_label ratio has to be more than :_rule_value
validation.max_size: :_label size has to be less than :_rule_value KB
validation.min_size: :_label size has to be more than :_rule_value KB
validation.width: :_label width has to be equal to :_rule_value px
validation.height: :_label height has to be equal to :_rule_value px
